name: Bubble Gum Ice Cream
description: The ultimate bubble gum ice cream recipe made with 4 ingredients and ZERO churning in minutes! This sweet childhood treat is so quick + easy!
instructions: In a mixing bowl or stand mixer fitted with the beater attachment, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form. Blend in sweetened condensed milk and bubble gum flavor. Fold in bubble gum with a spatula. Pour into a loaf pan or baking dish and freeze until solid (about 4 hours).
